summary: After realizing that all world is spoiled, Marie and Marie are committed to be spoiled themselves. They rip off older men, feast in lavish meals and do all kinds of mischief. But what is all this leading to?
cast: Ivana Karbanová|Jitka Cerhová|Marie Cesková|Jirina Myskova|Marcela Brezinová|Julius Albert|Oldrich Hora|Jan Klusák|Václav Chochola|Josef Konícek|Jaromír Vomácka|Miroslava Babúrková|J. Bartos|Oldrich Basus|Jirina Cesková|A. Drábek|Josef Hruby|Ester Krumbachová|Jaroslav Kucera|Jarosmir Kuvacha|Robert Kühnel|J. Laufer|V. Mysková|L. Nedved|J. Pecha|J. Tesárek|Frantisek Uldrich|V. Zikmund
title: Las margaritas
